projects.pain_point_description: Salesforce users face critical data quality issues including duplicate records, inconsistent data entry, poor data hygiene, AI/automation failures due to messy data, and manual data cleanup consuming 1+ hours daily per sales rep.

user_impact.time_wasted: 1+ hours daily per sales rep on manual data cleanup
user_impact.automation_failure_rate: 77% B2B implementation failure rate due to data quality
validation_sources: Reddit r/salesforce: 17+ upvotes on data quality discussion
Multiple LinkedIn posts highlighting data quality as #1 CRM failure reason
Industry reports showing 77% B2B implementation failure rate
User quote: 'Reps end up spending an hour a day manually entering things because the system can't trust the data'

techniques: Fuzzy String Matching using Levenshtein distance
Natural Language Processing for data standardization
Machine Learning Classification for quality scoring
Entity Resolution algorithms for duplicate detection
Real-time data validation using external APIs

demo_features: Real-time data quality scoring with letter grades (A-F)
AI-powered duplicate detection with similarity percentages
Automated data standardization (company names, phone numbers, emails)
Visual analytics dashboard showing quality metrics

expected_improvements.ai_model_reliability: Clean data enables reliable ML training

key_insights: Data quality is the foundation that makes or breaks CRM automation
AI and automation amplify data quality problems rather than solving them
Sales reps spend more time on data cleanup than actual selling
Fuzzy matching algorithms can effectively identify duplicates with 85%+ accuracy
Standardization rules can be automated using NLP techniques
Visual feedback helps users understand and trust AI recommendations
next_steps: Implement batch processing for large datasets
Add machine learning model training on user feedback
Create automated scheduling for regular data quality checks
